# Prevalence by district for loccally acquired covid cases in Taiwan from 01/01/2021 to 05/22/2021


```{r Prevalence map, echo=FALSE}
require(tmap)
tmap_mode("view")
incidence.map
```

### Notes
1. Prevalence is given as cases per 100,000 people
   盛行率是各鄉鎮市區每十萬人口的本土個案
   本土個案數據來源 Data source for case numbers: https://nidss.cdc.gov.tw/nndss/DiseaseMap?id=19CoV

2. Population data is from 2017. 人口為106年的人口
   Population data scource人口數據來源： https://data.gov.tw/dataset/8410

3. The Code used to make this map is available at: 
https://github.com/TulipsforTaiwan/TaiwanCovid
